parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: DisposalWay
parameters.description:
The handling method. Valid values:

*   **1**: Automatically Added to Whitelist
*   **2**: Defense Without Notification

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description: The name of the alert event. The value indicates a subtype.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to sas.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description:
The condition that is used to query alert events by asset. You can specify a value of the following types:

*   The IP address of the asset.
*   The public IP address of the asset.
*   The private IP address of the asset.
*   The name of the asset.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
